short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See all Chrome OS P2P updates in your local network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This gives you a detailed view of all Chrome OS P2P Cached Updates available in your local network. 


Source code is available at https://github.com/beaufortfrancois/cros-p2p-chrome-app
